examples: Dogs, cats, pigs and whales all have nipples too.

examples: The doctor examined her neck for any signs of injury.
His parents are always breathing down his neck.

words.defineEn: the body part that is connecting the head to the shoulders

examples: Election season always puts my dad's back up.

Right, pin back your ears, everyone.

The enemy was driven back.
words.defineEn: the part of our body between our neck and our legs that we cannot see
words.defineVi: phần cơ thể giữa cổ và chân mà chúng ta không thể nhìn thấy

examples: He's still playing his cards close to his chest.

I feel all better now that I got that off my chest.
Thank you for lending an ear, I feel much better now that I've gotten that off my chest.
words.defineEn: the front part of the body between the neck and the stomach

examples: The restaurant went belly up before the end of the first year.

I started with a plate of confit pork belly, enjoying the lusciously tender and flavorful meat that had been slow-cooked in its own fat.
Ten years working behind a desk has given him quite a belly!
words.defineEn: the front part of the body below the ribs that contains the stomach, intestines, etc.
words.defineVi: phần trước của cơ thể bên dưới xương sườn chứa dạ dày, ruột, v.v.

examples: One team of scientists found 1,458 brand new species in just 60 belly buttons.

It's my belly button.
It's my belly button.
It's my belly button.
words.defineEn: the small round hole in the front of a human stomach

I can always count on my bosom buddy to be there for me.
words.defineEn: either of the two round, fleshy parts on a woman’s chest that produce milk after childbirth
words.defineVi: một trong hai phần thịt tròn trên ngực của người phụ nữ tiết ra sữa sau khi sinh con

examples: It has cleavage.

words.defineEn: the part of the body between the ribs and hips, which is usually narrower than the parts mentioned

I gave a small donation.
words.defineEn: the narrower and lower part of someone's back
words.defineVi: phần hẹp hơn và thấp hơn của lưng của ai đó

examples: That sound is actually her abdomen hitting the ground.

Using their pincers, they go straight for each others’ abdomens.

Crustaceans include crabs, lobsters, shrimp, and barnacles, and like insects, they have three body segments: head, thorax and abdomen.
